verses.text_plain: These be the words which Moses spake unto all Israel on this side Jordan in the wilderness, in the plain over against the Red sea, between Paran, and Tophel, and Laban, and Hazeroth, and Dizahab.
verses.verse_html:
1These be the words which Moses spake unto all Israel on this side Jordan in the wilderness, in the plain over against the Red sea, between Paran, and Tophel, and Laban, and Hazeroth, and Dizahab. ▼
▼ the Red…: or, Zuph

footnotes.body_html: ▼ the Red…: or, Zuph

verses.text_plain: (There are eleven days’ journey from Horeb by the way of mount Seir unto Kadesh–barnea.)
verses.verse_html: 2(There are eleven days’ journey from Horeb by the way of mount Seir unto Kadesh–barnea.)

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month, on the first day of the month, that Moses spake unto the children of Israel, according unto all that the Lord had given him in commandment unto them;
verses.verse_html: 3And it came to pass in the fortieth year, in the eleventh month, on the first day of the month, that Moses spake unto the children of Israel, according unto all that the Lord had given him in commandment unto them;

tokens.text: And it came to pass in the fortieth
according unto all that the Lord

verses.text_plain: After he had slain Sihon the king of the Amorites, which dwelt in Heshbon, and Og the king of Bashan, which dwelt at Astaroth in Edrei:
verses.verse_html: 4After he had slain Sihon the king of the Amorites, which dwelt in Heshbon, and Og the king of Bashan, which dwelt at Astaroth in Edrei:

verses.text_plain: On this side Jordan, in the land of Moab, began Moses to declare this law, saying,
verses.verse_html: 5On this side Jordan, in the land of Moab, began Moses to declare this law, saying,

verses.text_plain: The Lord our God spake unto us in Horeb, saying, Ye have dwelt long enough in this mount:
verses.verse_html: 6The Lord our God spake unto us in Horeb, saying, Ye have dwelt long enough in this mount:

verses.text_plain: Turn you, and take your journey, and go to the mount of the Amorites, and unto all the places nigh thereunto, in the plain, in the hills, and in the vale, and in the south, and by the sea side, to the land of the Canaanites, and unto Lebanon, unto the great river, the river Euphrates.
verses.verse_html:
7Turn you, and take your journey, and go to the mount of the Amorites, and unto all the places nigh thereunto, in the plain, in the hills, and in the vale, and in the south, and by the sea side, to the land of the Canaanites, and unto Lebanon, unto the great river, the river Euphrates. ▼
▼ all…: Heb. all his neighbours

footnotes.body_html: ▼ all…: Heb. all his neighbours

verses.text_plain: Behold, I have set the land before you: go in and possess the land which the Lord sware unto your fathers, Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, to give unto them and to their seed after them.
verses.verse_html:
8Behold, I have set the land before you: go in and possess the land which the Lord sware unto your fathers, Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, to give unto them and to their seed after them. ▼
▼ set: Heb. given

tokens.text: unto them and to their seed

verses.text_plain: And I spake unto you at that time, saying, I am not able to bear you myself alone:
verses.verse_html: 9And I spake unto you at that time, saying, I am not able to bear you myself alone:

verses.text_plain: The Lord your God hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars of heaven for multitude.
verses.verse_html: 10The Lord your God hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye are this day as the stars of heaven for multitude.

verses.text_plain: (The Lord God of your fathers make you a thousand times so many more as ye are, and bless you, as he hath promised you!)
verses.verse_html: 11(The Lord God of your fathers make you a thousand times so many more as ye are, and bless you, as he hath promised you!)

verses.text_plain: How can I myself alone bear your cumbrance, and your burden, and your strife?
verses.verse_html: 12How can I myself alone bear your cumbrance, and your burden, and your strife?

verses.text_plain: Take you wise men, and understanding, and known among your tribes, and I will make them rulers over you.
verses.verse_html:
13Take you wise men, and understanding, and known among your tribes, and I will make them rulers over you. ▼
▼ Take: Heb. Give

verses.text_plain: And ye answered me, and said, The thing which thou hast spoken is good for us to do.
verses.verse_html: 14And ye answered me, and said, The thing which thou hast spoken is good for us to do.

verses.text_plain: So I took the chief of your tribes, wise men, and known, and made them heads over you, captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, and captains over fifties, and captains over tens, and officers among your tribes.
verses.verse_html:
15So I took the chief of your tribes, wise men, and known, and made them heads over you, captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, and captains over fifties, and captains over tens, and officers among your tribes. ▼
▼ made: Heb. gave

verses.text_plain: And I charged your judges at that time, saying, Hear the causes between your brethren, and judge righteously between every man and his brother, and the stranger that is with him.
verses.verse_html: 16And I charged your judges at that time, saying, Hear the causes between your brethren, and judge righteously between every man and his brother, and the stranger that is with him.

verses.text_plain: Ye shall not respect persons in judgment; but ye shall hear the small as well as the great; ye shall not be afraid of the face of man; for the judgment is God’s: and the cause that is too hard for you, bring it unto me, and I will hear it.
verses.verse_html:
17Ye shall not respect persons in judgment; but ye shall hear the small as well as the great; ye shall not be afraid of the face of man; for the judgment is God’s: and the cause that is too hard for you, bring it unto me, and I will hear it. ▼
▼ respect…: Heb. acknowledge faces

tokens.text: unto me, and I will hear

footnotes.body_html: ▼ respect…: Heb. acknowledge faces

verses.text_plain: And I commanded you at that time all the things which ye should do.
verses.verse_html: 18And I commanded you at that time all the things which ye should do.

verses.text_plain: And when we departed from Horeb, we went through all that great and terrible wilderness, which ye saw by the way of the mountain of the Amorites, as the Lord our God commanded us; and we came to Kadesh–barnea.
verses.verse_html: 19And when we departed from Horeb, we went through all that great and terrible wilderness, which ye saw by the way of the mountain of the Amorites, as the Lord our God commanded us; and we came to Kadesh–barnea.

verses.text_plain: And I said unto you, Ye are come unto the mountain of the Amorites, which the Lord our God doth give unto us.
verses.verse_html: 20And I said unto you, Ye are come unto the mountain of the Amorites, which the Lord our God doth give unto us.

verses.text_plain: Behold, the Lord thy God hath set the land before thee: go up and possess it, as the Lord God of thy fathers hath said unto thee; fear not, neither be discouraged.
verses.verse_html: 21Behold, the Lord thy God hath set the land before thee: go up and possess it, as the Lord God of thy fathers hath said unto thee; fear not, neither be discouraged.

verses.text_plain: And ye came near unto me every one of you, and said, We will send men before us, and they shall search us out the land, and bring us word again by what way we must go up, and into what cities we shall come.
verses.verse_html: 22And ye came near unto me every one of you, and said, We will send men before us, and they shall search us out the land, and bring us word again by what way we must go up, and into what cities we shall come.

tokens.text: unto me every one of you, and said
us, and they shall search us out

verses.text_plain: And the saying pleased me well: and I took twelve men of you, one of a tribe:
verses.verse_html: 23And the saying pleased me well: and I took twelve men of you, one of a tribe:

verses.text_plain: And they turned and went up into the mountain, and came unto the valley of Eshcol, and searched it out.
verses.verse_html: 24And they turned and went up into the mountain, and came unto the valley of Eshcol, and searched it out.

verses.text_plain: And they took of the fruit of the land in their hands, and brought it down unto us, and brought us word again, and said, It is a good land which the Lord our God doth give us.
verses.verse_html: 25And they took of the fruit of the land in their hands, and brought it down unto us, and brought us word again, and said, It is a good land which the Lord our God doth give us.

verses.text_plain: Notwithstanding ye would not go up, but rebelled against the commandment of the Lord your God:
verses.verse_html: 26Notwithstanding ye would not go up, but rebelled against the commandment of the Lord your God:

verses.text_plain: And ye murmured in your tents, and said, Because the Lord hated us, he hath brought us forth out of the land of Egypt, to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites, to destroy us.
verses.verse_html: 27And ye murmured in your tents, and said, Because the Lord hated us, he hath brought us forth out of the land of Egypt, to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites, to destroy us.

tokens.text: us, he hath brought us forth

verses.text_plain: Whither shall we go up? our brethren have discouraged our heart, saying, The people is greater and taller than we; the cities are great and walled up to heaven; and moreover we have seen the sons of the Anakims there.
verses.verse_html:
28Whither shall we go up? our brethren have discouraged our heart, saying, The people is greater and taller than we; the cities are great and walled up to heaven; and moreover we have seen the sons of the Anakims there. ▼
▼ discouraged: Heb. melted

verses.text_plain: Then I said unto you, Dread not, neither be afraid of them.
verses.verse_html: 29Then I said unto you, Dread not, neither be afraid of them.

verses.text_plain: The Lord your God which goeth before you, he shall fight for you, according to all that he did for you in Egypt before your eyes;
verses.verse_html: 30The Lord your God which goeth before you, he shall fight for you, according to all that he did for you in Egypt before your eyes;

tokens.text: for you, according to all that he did

verses.text_plain: And in the wilderness, where thou hast seen how that the Lord thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.
verses.verse_html: 31And in the wilderness, where thou hast seen how that the Lord thy God bare thee, as a man doth bear his son, in all the way that ye went, until ye came into this place.

verses.text_plain: Yet in this thing ye did not believe the Lord your God,
verses.verse_html: 32Yet in this thing ye did not believe the Lord your God,

verses.text_plain: Who went in the way before you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to shew you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day.
verses.verse_html: 33Who went in the way before you, to search you out a place to pitch your tents in, in fire by night, to shew you by what way ye should go, and in a cloud by day.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord heard the voice of your words, and was wroth, and sware, saying,
verses.verse_html: 34And the Lord heard the voice of your words, and was wroth, and sware, saying,

verses.text_plain: Surely there shall not one of these men of this evil generation see that good land, which I sware to give unto your fathers,
verses.verse_html: 35Surely there shall not one of these men of this evil generation see that good land, which I sware to give unto your fathers,

verses.text_plain: Save Caleb the son of Jephunneh; he shall see it, and to him will I give the land that he hath trodden upon, and to his children, because he hath wholly followed the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
36Save Caleb the son of Jephunneh; he shall see it, and to him will I give the land that he hath trodden upon, and to his children, because he hath wholly followed the Lord. ▼
▼ wholly…: Heb. fulfilled to go after

tokens.text: it, and to him will I give

footnotes.body_text: ▼ wholly…: Heb. fulfilled to go after
footnotes.body_html: ▼ wholly…: Heb. fulfilled to go after

verses.text_plain: Also the Lord was angry with me for your sakes, saying, Thou also shalt not go in thither.
verses.verse_html: 37Also the Lord was angry with me for your sakes, saying, Thou also shalt not go in thither.

verses.text_plain: But Joshua the son of Nun, which standeth before thee, he shall go in thither: encourage him: for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.
verses.verse_html: 38But Joshua the son of Nun, which standeth before thee, he shall go in thither: encourage him: for he shall cause Israel to inherit it.

tokens.text: him: for he shall cause Israel

verses.text_plain: Moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children, which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil, they shall go in thither, and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.
verses.verse_html: 39Moreover your little ones, which ye said should be a prey, and your children, which in that day had no knowledge between good and evil, they shall go in thither, and unto them will I give it, and they shall possess it.

tokens.text: thither, and unto them will I give

verses.text_plain: But as for you, turn you, and take your journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.
verses.verse_html: 40But as for you, turn you, and take your journey into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.

verses.text_plain: Then ye answered and said unto me, We have sinned against the Lord, we will go up and fight, according to all that the Lord our God commanded us. And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war, ye were ready to go up into the hill.
verses.verse_html: 41Then ye answered and said unto me, We have sinned against the Lord, we will go up and fight, according to all that the Lord our God commanded us. And when ye had girded on every man his weapons of war, ye were ready to go up into the hill.

tokens.text: according to all that the Lord
us. And when ye had girded

verses.text_plain: And the Lord said unto me, Say unto them, Go not up, neither fight; for I am not among you; lest ye be smitten before your enemies.
verses.verse_html: 42And the Lord said unto me, Say unto them, Go not up, neither fight; for I am not among you; lest ye be smitten before your enemies.

verses.text_plain: So I spake unto you; and ye would not hear, but rebelled against the commandment of the Lord, and went presumptuously up into the hill.
verses.verse_html:
43So I spake unto you; and ye would not hear, but rebelled against the commandment of the Lord, and went presumptuously up into the hill. ▼
▼ went…: Heb. ye were presumptuous, and went up

tokens.text: unto you; and ye would not hear

footnotes.body_text: ▼ went…: Heb. ye were presumptuous, and went up
footnotes.body_html: ▼ went…: Heb. ye were presumptuous, and went up

verses.text_plain: And the Amorites, which dwelt in that mountain, came out against you, and chased you, as bees do, and destroyed you in Seir, even unto Hormah.
verses.verse_html: 44And the Amorites, which dwelt in that mountain, came out against you, and chased you, as bees do, and destroyed you in Seir, even unto Hormah.

verses.text_plain: And ye returned and wept before the Lord; but the Lord would not hearken to your voice, nor give ear unto you.
verses.verse_html: 45And ye returned and wept before the Lord; but the Lord would not hearken to your voice, nor give ear unto you.

verses.text_plain: So ye abode in Kadesh many days, according unto the days that ye abode there.
verses.verse_html: 46So ye abode in Kadesh many days, according unto the days that ye abode there.
